features: 【48 PCS WOODEN STONE TOYS】This set of 48 stacking rocks for kids comes in different colors, shapes, and sizes, making it a fun montessori toys that can help kids learn about colors, shapes, balance, and stimulate their creativity. A perfect sensory toys for toddlers 1-3, easy to follow but still provides a challenge, also a great kids learning toys ages 2-4 up.

【HIGH-QUALITY SAFE MATERIAL 】Made of high-quality wood, eco-friendly and safe for kids, painted with non-toxic paint, create a smooth, burr-free surface for better child, safe for little hands and mouths. Safe toddler toys age 1-2 and up, suitable montessori for 3+ year old.

【PRESCHOOL EDUCATIONAL TOYS】This educational building toys can guide toddlers 1-3 to learn to count, sort and stack. Kids 3+ year old can use blocks to build different towers, form letters, animals, and more shapes from 2D to 3D. A great preschool toys to help improve kid's focus and patience, as well as enhance their motor skills, hand-eye coordination, imagination, balancing ability, visual and spatial awareness.

【BALANCING & STACKING GAME】Kids can have fun playing building games with friends in kindergarten, or with parents at home. Cooperating with little friends to build high and stable towers can make the class more interesting and imprive kids social skills. Toddlers can play with parents while learning grasping and sorting, a fun parent-child activity. Not only a building toys, but also a good teaching tool.

【IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS】The rainbow wooden stacking stones are attractive to kids and they also have entertainment and education value, making it a perfect gift for 1 2 3 4 5 6 year old boys girls on birthday, Christmas, Halloween, Easter, etc. The exquisite box and storage bag make it easy to store when not in use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Preschool Learning Stacking Toys for Kids 1-6

Fun Montessori Toys for 1+ Year Old Our Montessori toys not only bring children joy, but also aim to stimulate their imagination and creativity. Children can use our stackable stones to create a variety of interesting and meaningful patterns, which help to express their ideas or feelings and will give them a sense of achievement. Happy Family Game A good parent-child interactive toy, can increase interaction time with children, enhance the family relationship with children! Parents also can timely give children assistance and guidance, so that children can actively learn simple sorting, counting and other preschool knowledge. Classroom Toys for Toddlers 1-3 Our building block set is not only children's toys, but also a good choice of teaching resources in parent-child or teacher-students interaction. Colored rainbow stacking rocks can attract children's attention, and can be used to keep learning while playing. Good teaching tool for parents or teacher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for kids and adults
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking at these for a while and decided to get it as a Christmas gift for my daughter. Great quality and colors! Great gross motor activity for my toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter love it!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is almost 6 and she loved it! So much imagination used, is very sturdy but not heavy the colors are beautiful, definitely a 5 starts review!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have an autistic grandson and enjoys playing with these blocks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A new twist on an old toy
reviews.reviewText: I really like the concept of this toy. It opens up a more creative way of building than the more traditional squares and rectangles. This is a gift so my grandson hasn't played with it yet. I took 1 star because it says for children 1+ but I just feel that some of the pieces are a little too small for that age group. We will probably hold those pieces back until he is a little older.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and challenging.
reviews.reviewText: Kids like them; I like them. Fun shapes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product for young toddlers and older.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Older kids loved these!
reviews.reviewText: I have an 11 year old and 8 year old twins. They had seen pictures of people who stack rocks/stones in nature and thought it was amazing so I got these and they are SO excited!These are nice quality blocks in all sorts of beautiful colors. They are different shapes with all sorts of different angles and edges and profiles.Kids can learn about physics, cantilevered, balance etc all through fun. They spent well over 1.5 hours the first day trying out different challenges like how tall can you get with the skinniest base etc.I absolutely love these types of toys and this set is a quality great set!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the product some blocks are way too small. Inspect carefully for little ones.
